column5: I have made a wish list of goodies to set up my new little fishing boat that adds up to the original cost of my new little fishing boat. I know I don't need it all right now even though that be my preference, I will try and be strong not to over strain my plastic to make it happen. I made the list up on the Pro Bass web site and my first thought was to pick away at it using them as my main supplier. However I was wondering who some of you guys use to equip your fishin rigs? How worth while is it to try and make fishing and boat shows to buy seats, trolling motors, fish finders, etc?
You can sometimes get some sweet deals on the last afternoon of a show

the last day of ANY show is when the best deals happen as they don't want to pack it up and lug it back...  This way, the sales at the end of the show can show a ROI (for all sales put through) and to the dealer it was worth it in the end.
